title: Cosmic
description: It's one giant leap for all boy-kind in Frank Cottrell Boyce's out-of-this-world Cosmic . Liam is too big for his boots. And his football strip. And his school blazer. But being super-sized height-wise has its he's the only eleven-year-old to ever ride the G-force-defying Cosmic rollercoaster â€“ or to be offered the chance to drive a Porsche. Long-legged Liam makes a giant leap for boy-kind by competing with a group of adults for the chance to go into space. Is Liam the best boy for the job? Sometimes being big isn't all about being a grown-up. This edition of Cosmic includes bonus material and discussion questions from Frank Cottrell Boyce and features fantastic cover artwork from Steven Lenton.
author: Frank Cottrell Boyce
